item.title: RFC: making Swift.org a more valuable resource for the Swift community
item.description: On the Swift forum Ted Kremenek has written a request for comment regarding making Swift.org a more valuable resource for the Swift community. Ted suggests that Swift.org could be improved, and is asking the community what changes they would like to see. Itâ€™s great to see the core team interacting with the community like this.
